english.segment1: Your Pride and Joy is a Pretty Beast. The baddest apples fall from rotten trees. The little monster is a walking disease. You got only yourself to blame . Cause all else failed!
english.segment2: And youre. HOT HOT. On my trail and you know that its. NOT NOT. Not my fault but you know that you. GOTTA GOTTA. Pin the Tail when all else fails. Cuckoo, cuckoo!
english.segment3: Biting the hand that over-feeds. Lord of the Flies aint no mystery. Mean as Murder or Precious and Sweet?. You got only yourself to blame . Cause all else failed!
english.segment4: Momma hide the children. Someone get the baby!. Momma turn all the lights on. Somebody pull the shades!
